item.title: Git-repair for broken git repositories
item.description:
My Repository Suddenly Broke! Here’s How I Fixed It

Yesterday, I was mildly working on one of my GitHub repositories, making solid progress, when disaster struck. Just as I was about to git push my hard-working changes, my repositoryâ€¦ broke. Completely.

At first, I thought, “Oh no, what did I mess up this time?” Cue the classic facepalm of frustration.

After some minor crying, I turned to AI for a solution. However, the suggestions I got from ChatGPT were… unconventiona. I read through them, skeptical but hopeful, and decided to give them a shot anyway.
